title: io.quarkus.it.main.SwaggerUIITCase.testSwaggerUi test failing with GraalVM / Mandrel 22.1-dev
body:
### Describe the bug

$title

### Expected behavior

Test should pass.

### Actual behavior

Test fails with:

```
 java.lang.AssertionError: 
1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: a string containing "#swagger-ui"
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

GH runner

### Output of `java -version`

11.0.14 and 17.0.2
